hero-section.token: The token that powers the ARGATIO real estate tokenization platform

fixed-yield.title: Fixed yield
fixed-yield.text: Investors receive a fixed annual yield (APY) of 8%, distributed monthly.

stake.title: Stake
stake.text: Investing in fractions of properties, diversifying and minimizing risks.

high-liquidity.title: High Liquidity
high-liquidity.text: Tokens can be sold on the secondary market, offering flexibility and quick access to funds.

staking.title: Staking
staking.text: The ARGA tokens can be used in staking programs to generate additional yields.
